name: CL_LEARN_ASSES_OTS
description: It stores information that changes over time, such as patient contact date, whether or not the assessment was verified, and the last time assessment was edited or entered.

columns.name: LEARNING_ASSMT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the patient learning assessment record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date in external format.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: The contact number for the contact.

columns.name: PAT_DAT
columns.description: Patient visit date for the patient learning assessment record contact.

columns.name: EPT_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the patient contact to which this patient learning assessment record is associated.

columns.name: VERIFIED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the assessment is verified for this contact.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY
columns.description: The date and time when the learning assessment was entered.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_EDIT
columns.description: The date and time when the learning assessment was edited.

columns.name: END_CONT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of the last encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: IS_DELETED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the assessment is deleted for this contact. Y indicates that the learning assessment is deleted; N or a null value indicates that the learning assessment is not deleted.
